content:
/>
XI.iii.1.B.7.p
.
Following Disposition of Remains
Following final disposition of the Veteran's remains, the IVURC will
prepare a
VA Form 27-0820
, identifying and documenting all circumstances of the case in which responsibility was assumed by
an interested person or next of kin, for claimed remains, or
a cooperating funeral director or other institution, for unclaimed remains, and
upload the
VA Form 27-0820
to the Veteran's eFolder.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B  - Burial Benefits
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
